website_summaries.verdict: A solidly built commercial-grade rake that can handle the toughest jobs.
pros: This rake features a 16-tine steel head that is welded and riveted to a durable 58-inch fiberglass handle
It might just be the last rake you ever need to buy
cons: 58 inches may be too short for some, but there is also a 66-inch version of this rake

customer_reviews.title: Well made, solid rake
customer_reviews.text: I am a 70 year old woman and I love this rake. My last rake was not welded to the shaft and would come apart several times during a raking project. This rake is well made and looks like it will last a long time. As compared to my "big box" rake: the Bully rake weighs about the same and the handle is about 4" shorter. At 4'11", that is not a bad thing for me. Spent the morning yesterday spreading mulch and doing some garden clean up. The rake did what it was supposed to without coming apart every third pull.
customer_reviews.author: Leone

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tool and Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: First, this is a solid, well built rake, not a light weight gardening tool I often see in hardware or home improvement stores. I purchased this rake from Amazon and when it arrived, the top rubber part was missing. Still usable, of course, but not completely what I expected. Rather than contact Amazon and send the large bulky item back for a replacement, I contacted Bully Tools directly to see if I could get a replacement part. The company contacted me within 10 minutes and let me know they would be sending out a replacement part the next day. That is what I call great service and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: Spot-welds fail
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time I used it. The rake is spot-welded to the support arms and the spot-weld broke about three strokes into my first use,
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, broke on the very first use out of the box while raking dirt. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William A Possanza

customer_reviews.title: It's almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you are 5'10" or shorter, you will love this. It's a high quality USA-made tool, with good welds and a nice strong fiberglass handle. But, it's too short - - - it's about a foot shorter than the broken product it's replacing. I'm 6'3", and it's annoying to use compared to my old one. And I'm quite sure that if Bully tools reads this they say, "Hey (not) Steve. If we made it longer, that would add to our production cost and we'd have to charge $2 more for it." And they're right, of course. $2 more that I gladly would have spent.
customer_reviews.author: NotSteve

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after one year.
customer_reviews.text: We use garden rakes once a year to clear out a single 10 x 3 feet of garden every Mother's Day to plant our vegetables. So this one, which is stored under a covered porch, has been used exactly once. Today, we were about to give it our second go when the rake just came apart. We have an old metal rake with a wooden handle that has been with us for 25 years at least. I only bought a new one because the wood handle always gives me blisters. My mom always said "old is good; new is bad." I guess she was right in this case!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rake for general lawn care and moving rocks
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid rake. I've used it to move river rock, dethatch my lawn and rake leaves. It is in the heavy side and very well made. However I bought a light leaf rake to save my back and am going to try a dethatching rake to see if it more effective. Overall a great product to have - especially if you are like me and own very few gardening tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kouveliotes

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: You've gotta have one of these if you have a yard. So often you need a firm rake, but very often I use this in my fire pit just for a quick move of some stuff I'm burning. I'm not saying keep it in the fire. That would destroy the parts that connect it to the metal. But it's so handy to adjust things burning. And of course if you garden at all, you need this essential yard tool. This one is well made and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Carol

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this rake and I bought it based on the other reviews. The first time I took it out the handle ripped out of the head. The hole for the rivet that holds the handle in place was drilled right at the end of the handle. There was nowhere near enough material past the rivet to hold the handle in place. I jammed the handle back in and drilled a hole further up and secured the handle with a wood screw I had on hand. Seems to work fine now but I’m very disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: William Hatley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built
customer_reviews.text: You can tell just by holding this rake that it's a fine tool that is built for the long run. I live in Arizona where the soil is hard and rocky and it would be easy for a rake to come apart. This rake feels both solid/heavy duty in my hands, and the head seems VERY securely connected to the stem of the rake. Very very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: David M. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 5”4 woman and I have no problem to using it in my yard. I love the sturdiness that is exactly what I was searching. Overall I looks like a very quality material and a durable item. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TaniaSD

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy high quality rake!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality rake. It was a little large (too long for a short lady). and heavy for me to enjoy using, so I gave it to my yard guy. He really likes it. I've gone back to my old lightweight rake. This is more of a man size rake. It is quite sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rake to evenly spread compost over my garden. I am a 58 year old woman with not a lot of upper body strength, and was a little concerned this might be too heavy to use for more than a few minutes at a time. However, I was pleasantly surprised by how light and well balanced this tool is. I can use it for more than an hour and not break a sweat.
customer_reviews.author: cottercat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, yet light
customer_reviews.text: Feels light, despite its size. This maybe because of the fiberglass handle. Made in America, this rake feels a lot sturdier than any of the tools you find in your local home improvement store. The one downside is that the rake at 16" is wider than I expected, so it is not well suited for raking in a flower bed. If you want a narrower rake to work between flowers, themay be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Duppie

customer_reviews.title: Not made of wood , probably last into the next century .
customer_reviews.text: I am only 5’2 and 118 lbs 63 year old large garden garden this rake gives me the ability to rule over the leaves or weeds without Needing electricity power anything . Old fashioned gardener and previous farm girl.
customer_reviews.author: Rambling rose

customer_reviews.title: Well-suited to spread gravel and topsoil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rake initially to spread and level gravel on my driveway. It did the job well. Since then I've used it to spread a lot of topsoil and it makes quick work of that task. Absolutely no complaints here; it is strong and durable. I imagine this is the last rake of this type that I'll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: great rake!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and thankfully lightweight rake. It did not ship well and some slight cosmetic damage, but a great tool for the garden...or any project requiring a rake. mone well spent.
customer_reviews.author: de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Good rake
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t familiar with this brand before buying this rake and a shovel. Their fiberglass rake is sturdy and light. It’s reasonably priced. It’s so far handled a lot of gardening and yard work without damage of any kind. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Up

customer_reviews.title: If you're needing one... this is it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a freaking tank... it won't break unless you do something stupid. Even then, I'm sure its gonna take it for most part. Use it for what it's intended and it will last you for a VERY long time
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few years
customer_reviews.text: This rake has a lifetime guarantee but there is no information how to do an exchange. The welding on one of the the rake snapped. The piece that holds the tines is now hanging. Unable to use now. Amazon make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I used it when I was laying down new grass seed. Easy to use - I’m 5”0 and was able to use this item easily. Great item for tilling soul. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ordered it again, again, again, and again.
customer_reviews.text: fourth time ordered. I like this rake and keep ordering it, but the handle breaks after a few months of use. It's not a cheap tool and can't keep paying for a new one. I wish the manufacturer could figure out a way to make the handle less breakable.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rake!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rake! I thought it was a little pricey but bought one because of the favorable reviews. Ended up buying a second one for my cabin as I was impressed with the first. Seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave U.

customer_reviews.title: Hollow pvc- wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on review. Came a little damaged and hollow pvc handle. Not crazy about. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This one is as good as the rakes I had before. As other reviewers mention, it's indeed a bit shorter than most rakes (but no issue for me - I'm 5'10") and it is weirdly in pink (I painted it white).
customer_reviews.author: Wim

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Head broke off while raking dirt. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: This rake is great. Very sturdy and it feels indestructible yet easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This rake is great. Very sturdy and it feels indestructible yet easy to maneuver at the same time. Moves rocks just as easy as mulch and dirt. I beat the heck out of it on my last project and it still looks and performs brand new
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to work
customer_reviews.text: This rake is great. While not being light weight, this rake is not to heavy. Good balance and rigid tines make it great for removing debris
customer_reviews.author: Jokelly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. Great tines and perfect for grass seed prepping.
customer_reviews.text: I hope and pray this great take does not break off. It’s really nice and I have a barn full of broken tools.
customer_reviews.author: droughtsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product.  Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well very made rake, well braced all around for heavy duty work.
customer_reviews.author: Clarke Dunham

customer_reviews.title: a great product over the cheap stuff you get locally
customer_reviews.text: With tough use we put it through already clearing land of thick canada thistles to burn before they started getting green, and rocks, a great product over the cheap stuff you get locally. If the rocks aren't too big, flip to rake over and move rocks easily instead of getting a shovel. The tynes aren't bending and the connection of the tool to the handle won't be coming apart anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: rds

customer_reviews.title: Very poor coating on tools
customer_reviews.text: Received my new rake which I planned to gift to a family member today with no time to exchange. Opened the box and found that it was scratched in multiple locations. Very poor paint quality on the handle. Otherwise, it looks like a solid product. Slightly disappointed in the price to quality.
customer_reviews.author: Acuraroman

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from a rake I bought on amazon for relativity inexpensive. I was pleasantly surprised. This rack is much heaver than I thought it would be. Very sturdy. I used it for a little spreading gravel and some mulch, worked like a rack should.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I also have bully tools shovel that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I love it. I also have bully tools shovel that is great. I do a lot of yard work in extremely heavy clay and have destroyed a number of garden tools but so far bully tools has a zero percent failure rate. The hardware stores around here don't carry their products, I suspect because they make even their "high-end" offerings look cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: used & abused everything from dirt to stones and store outside. Holding up so far (6 months)
customer_reviews.text: Paint chipped and it's a little rusty but we use and abuse out tools everyday and store them outside in the elements so not a huge deal it doesn't seem weaker or anything. This is very short I wouldn't buy this length again although it's sometimes convenient for certain spaces it's less practical. Also we had to glue the rubber handle on it kept popping off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: missing cap on handle
customer_reviews.text: Box was perfect but on cap on end of handle...sent request for the missing part and was told to send back...hmm not the first one for this problem...will buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: jack s.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Weld broke leaving the rake useless. So much for a warranty when it is impossible to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED for the AMERICAN MADE
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and received, removed it from the package and no Bully dog AMERICAN MADE decal on handle. I sure hope this is the same AMERICAN PRODUCT I purchased. Tired of the China crap we get sold. I haven't used it. But looks like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Welding came apart after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: The welding broke after 4 uses (leveling soil and piling yard debris).
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the angle on this rack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the angle on this rack. Look at the photo. You can hold the rake at a higher angle than other hoes. This saves your back. The fact that it is built by Bully means it will save your pocketbook in the long run. With proper storage and keeping away from fires (fiberglass handle) it should last a lifetime and maybe in your children's lawn & garden arsenal one day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this rake over the summer and the results are in. This is possibly the best rake I've ever used. It's lightweight yet incredibly atrong and durable. I love tools made to standards like this. Im very hard on my tools and am known for breaking things easily. This thing just keeps on going. The grip keeps this rake in hand through even the hardest jobs, letting me tackle projects with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: wonderful garden tool
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and it is a great rake. Well worth the money. It is easy to use and will help with our community flower garden. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jpkantqs

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good quality rake.
customer_reviews.text: I was fed up with rakes that kept coming apart. The Bully Tools rake is good quality. I used it to rake 2" gravel on my path and also to rake snow off the path. I will check Bully Tools first next time a purchase is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Desert Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Rake
customer_reviews.text: Needed a heavy duty rake and this one works great. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Buy this rake
customer_reviews.text: It's a great rake, what else can I say? I've been raking dirt, rocks, grass, and everything in between with it. Hasn't skipped a beat. I would highly recommend this rake to anyone looking for a durable product that will last them a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Feels sturdy. Havent broken it yet, will update when/if it does.
customer_reviews.author: E Tubolino

customer_reviews.title: Great rake!
customer_reviews.text: I've mentioned before how much I love Bully Tools. They are great products. So well made! It's sturdy, price is decent and it gets the job done. I look for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: One of the best rakes I have ever owned....I'll buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best made rake I have owned, including my Dad's old wooden handle rake. Pleasantly "over engineered" and heavy duty craftsmanship. In addition, I really like that it was made in the USA! I paid a little more but, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenep

customer_reviews.title: Worth it so far
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with it. Time will tell because our family can break the unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, I realize that spending money on quality tools is cheaper in the long run. I'm very satified with the strength of this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Tough, durable and exceptionally well designed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool the same time as my Steel Grass Hook and have been exceptionally pleased with the performance. Well made, durable and tough! Looking forward to really getting into the garden this fall for next years crops and flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great rake that’s not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong yet relatively lightweight rake. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bells

customer_reviews.title: Not welded. Appears to have been glued together
customer_reviews.text: Love handle. But the weld was Not. It looks like it was just glued. Lasted 10 minutes before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy tools
customer_reviews.text: Bully makes the best and sturdiest tools, and this rake is no exception. I expect this one will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: Bully is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Bully Tools are the best! We have r placed all of our manual garden tools with Bully Products.
customer_reviews.author: R. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy rake. That's a good thing and it's well built but it will wear you out! I have found that all Bully tools are heavy. I'd really like a rake that's not quite so good!
customer_reviews.author: kevazzp

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. I just got tired of repairing old one that kept falling apart. This one is sturdy and good investment for what l need.
customer_reviews.author: Iva G

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Heavy duty and definitely feels like it will last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: works great Light weight and does not rust when you leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been great. Well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great but not invincible
customer_reviews.text: Great but not invincible. Only use for dirt. That may have been my mistake oops!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected but still does the job..
customer_reviews.author: Brian Devine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for reseeding my lawn after the had to dig it up to fix a pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WELL BUILT
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY DUTY FOR SURE. WAY BETTER THAN THEY SALE AT MOST BIG BOX STORES..
customer_reviews.author: ronnief

customer_reviews.title: Best take I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best take I have ever used. Durable and with the shape of the prongs they pull material and level ground well.
customer_reviews.author: Mt89

customer_reviews.title: Quality feeling tool
customer_reviews.text: Broke fiberglass handle - must have had a defect. Amazon replaced hassle free. Second rake has not had any issues. Light weight yet durable. does the job I needed.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: You will never buy another rake. The head is welded and will never break on you.
customer_reviews.author: Phlangdon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built, very solid, a pleasure to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well built, very solid, a pleasure to use. Well balanced and made in the USA. Much nicer product that what can be found at the big box store and shipped to my door! Will buy more tools from this company.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with this rake!!! Very durable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nessalove

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool. Keeps moves my xeriscape rocks where I want them!
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake
customer_reviews.text: use it for commercial work. Well made. Felt a little bit bad ordering it, as it came in a refrigerator sized box (almost) but the local outfits all sold homeowner quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: The rake is light but super strong, the shaft is fiberglass and won't give splinters, the rake head is solidly welded and attached to the shaft with a steel pin which is riveted together. I expect to get many years of use out of this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Commercial Grade product
customer_reviews.text: American made, heavy duty commercial grade rake. This is a lifetime product - the kind of rake you use for raking large gravel and rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but seems to be a nice tool. Works well
customer_reviews.text: different from what I am use to, but seems to be a nice tool. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty & a little heavy but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Very heavy duty & a little heavy but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality rake. Makes the job easier since the weight of the rake does much of the work.
customer_reviews.author: r litch

customer_reviews.title: working mans friend
customer_reviews.text: glad i ordered this product. tired of the cheap stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rake. Sturdy and looks like it'll last a long while.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: like the way the tines taper larger as they get to the connecting rod . makes em stronger
customer_reviews.author: Lance Scaper

customer_reviews.title: Great for construction use
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction, should get many years of use with it. I will be looking for Bully Tools for future purchases of similar items.
customer_reviews.author: LDP

customer_reviews.title: A true rake
customer_reviews.text: Bully Tools are the best and toughest and made in the US of A. This rake will NEVER pull out and away from the handle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product compared to others I have used with wood handles
customer_reviews.author: WhiteBoyTexas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I just used my new rake to clean up my yard for the summer...made it a breeze! Best rake I've ever used. I'll never go back to a wooden handle!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best rake I've ever seen. Sturdy enough to push angular rock around without bending. I expect this rake will last longer than I.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood P Dowd

customer_reviews.title: USA, USA, MADE IN THE USA
customer_reviews.text: Very good rake, excellent quality, well balanced, handel is a comfortable length, long enough to keep you from leaning over too much. Best of all it is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: krh316

customer_reviews.title: it's a rake
customer_reviews.text: the item is high quality, durable, and fit for purpose. Packaging was very shoddy, but in the end it arrived none the worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pop ina Bottle

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a more heavy duty rake.Should last forever, great for heavy duty garden work.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's been a great rake for us that we have used for gravel so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Case

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times and the metal head broke. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: PINK??
customer_reviews.text: Not just pink. But, Bright PINK?! WTF?! Hell NO! Returning.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than any rake we could find in a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about 6 months and works great. Comfortable handle and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery P.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was meant to do.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it much, but it arrived on time, was ready to use, and did the job I bought it to do.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: ... this rake for smoothing out soil and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rake for smoothing out soil and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Rat

customer_reviews.title: It works well and appears very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid tool.It works well and appears very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice rake
customer_reviews.text: I have not had time to put it through its paces but it seems well built. If it holds up I'll add another star. It has held up and use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh B. MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: I use rakes on a regular basis, and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I use rakes on a regular basis, and I need them tough and reliable. Bully Tools rakes fits that bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best rake ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best rakes I've ever purchased - based upon other reviews, I was initially sold, but sometimes that's not always my experience. Thankfully, my experience aligns with other reviews. Almost all of my other experiences with these style of rakes, is they usually fall apart pretty easily. Thankfully, this one is fiberglass (keeps it light) and very solid, with a screw that helps keep it together as well. I hope to continue to have this in use for many many years on our hobby farm in Northern Minnesota. I've ordered another, to have on hand, for multiple people to be able to rake.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Haddy

customer_reviews.title: Get your Y chromosome on
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA. What does that mean other than overpriced and poor product? Well, in this case, it's good old fashioned 'Murica! Over engineered and well made. I've looked at a lot of garden rakes at big-box stores and was underwhelmed with the Chinese representations. Crap! I wasn't expecting what I recieved. So far this has been a "Tool Man" style tool. Over engineered and well made to pass down to your kids. Why not a 5-star rating? Because it's not an entirely forged rake end. Nobody makes that, but that's the ultimate 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

product_meta.title: Bully Tools 92309 12-Gauge 16-Inch Bow Rake with Fiberglass Handle and 16 Steel Tines, 58-Inch
product_meta.description:
Bully Tools bow rakes feature extra thick 10 gauge steel. The connection to the handle is welded and will not separate. The triple wall fiberglass handle resists breakage while still being lightweight and easy to handle.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tools made to last a lifetime, and be passed on from generation to generation. 100% Made in the USA Bully Tools is bringing back that tradition with tools built to endure years of hard labor. We have re-engineered the classic designs of shovels, rakes and other popular tools to create more efficient, durable products. Special features on specific products include true 14 gauge steel, triple wall reinforced fiberglass handles, extended length ferrules, and welded I-beam supports. We stand behind our products and offer a limited lifetime warranty. If one of our tools fails during normal use, we will replace or refund it! In a time when cheap foreign products are the norm, Bully Tools offers affordable, high quality Made in the USA goods.
